title: flex 2.6.4 fails on Ubuntu 18.04 with gcc 7.3.0
body:
`flex` fails to install

### Expected Result

`spack install flex` succeed.

### Actual Result


### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install flex
```

### Information on your system

- Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
- GCC 7.3.0
